title: Alestorm-Sunset On The Golden Age(Limited Ed. 2CD)  MP3 320k  ak
description:
Alestorm-Sunset On The Golden Age 2CD  MP3 320k  ak2014 What we got Alestorm 2CD Limited Edition 2CD Set includes a 6-track disc of acoustic bonus tracks.

Avast, ye landlubbers! From the deepest darkest depths of eastern Scotland comes Alestorm, a drunken band of pirates on an epic quest to drink your beer, steal your rum, and be the greatest damn band that ever did sail the seven seas!


Hot on the heels of their recent live album "Live at the End of the World", Alestorm are releasing their 4th full length album, entitled "Sunset on the Golden Age". Prepare to have your mind blown with some of the catchiest Pirate Metal anthems you've ever heard, with tales of mythological creatures, epic battles, and swashbuckling action that'll make you want to raise up a pint of rum and sing your heart out!

Describing their style as "True Scottish Pirate Metal", Alestorm plays an infectious blend of modern folk and power metal with a unique piratical twist.
